<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Physical <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Damage: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Blunt <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★★ <tab>Omega's power reigned supreme within the interdimensional rift, allowing it to access a store of collected data and synthesize all manner of entities and objects─including giant, rocket-propelled fists of unyielding metal.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Тип: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Физический <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Урон: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Тупой <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Ранг: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★★★ <tab>Это заклинание подражает сверхъестественной мощи покровителя Цитянь Дашэн: заклинатель взмывает в воздух и раскручивает удлиняющийся посох из чистого эфира в вихрь неистовой силы.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Physical <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Damage: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Blunt <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★★★ <tab>A technique employed by Suzaku, wherein the auspice unleashes a swift series of blurring kicks. The “phantom” half of the name is a somewhat nebulous reference to a constellation in Far Eastern astrology, the sign of which is said to bring good fortune in all matters...except that of matrimony.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Magic <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Aspect: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>None <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★★★ <tab>This extravagant technique belongs to Tsukuyomi, Lady of the Moon, whose malignant ire manifests as a field of flowers which then burst apart in a hail of deadly petals. Accept the inevitability of the grave, and the power of the nightbloom is yours to wield...

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Тип: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Физический <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Урон: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Тупой <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Ранг: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★ <tab>Этот проверенный временем приём, излюбленный хобгоблинами, действует по принципу “бей до потери сознания”. Синие маги усиливают атаку, направляя магию в кулаки, которые становятся более мощными, если их соединить с камнес, чтобы встретить врага лицом к лицу.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Physical <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Damage: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Blunt <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★ <tab>This spell recreates the devastating way in which the greater armadillo swings an enormous boulder in its clawed tail as if wielding a flail. A boulder is conjured from aether and similarly swung at great speed, sending nearby foes flying.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Magic <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Aspect: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>None <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★ <tab>Certain species of armadillo have learned to channel aether into their shells, thus granting them the hardness of metal. A similar stratagem allows the blue mage to reflect physical blows back upon an attacker─though unfortunately, both armadillo and man still feel the intial, teeth-rattling impact.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Magic <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Aspect: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>None <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★ <tab>Particularly savvy armadillos are capable of healing themselves by drawing upon the moisture in the air, and by imitating this behavior, mages can enjoy the selfsame benefits─including flawless skin.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Тип: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Магический <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Элемент: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Нет <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Ранг: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★ <tab>Приобретённое у одного из видов ракообразных, обитающих в Новом Свете, это заклинание выполняется путем смешивания эфира нескольких элементов и высвобождения его одним взрывом. Это нарушает эфирный баланс цели, постепенно лишая ее сил.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Physical <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Damage: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Blunt <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★★ <tab>Embracing rage in the fashion of the spectral berserker allows one to unleash an unbridled wave of destruction. As many a parable will attest, however, anger is a double-edged sword; the spell consumes a great deal of energy, and the caster is advised to be wary of untimely exhaustion.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Magic <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Aspect: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Earth <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★ <tab>Taking a filthy page from the mudman, this spell coalesces earth-aspected aether into a clump of mud, which is hurled at enemies. Those who are struck bear stubborn mud stains that diminish their self-worth, causing a lingering enervation.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Physical <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Damage: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Blunt <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★ <tab>Taking a spotless page from the Seeker of Solitude, this spell summons forth a magicked broom to sweep the area clean. Each mud stain it removes serves to affirm its self-worth, and it imparts that sense of well-being to the caster.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Physical <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Damage: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Slashing <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★★ <tab>In order to extend its claws for a near-inescapable strike, the Ruby Weapon transforms energy generated by its advanced dynamo unit. Albeit on a smaller scale, the mage recreates this technique by channeling aether into numerous razor-sharp aetherial blades.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Magic <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Aspect: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>None <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★★ <tab>The language of the fae folk is composed of runes, symbols that harbor magic, and the faerie king Titania was partial to this one. When invoked, it emits an aetheric wave that resonates with the target's magical energies, making them surpassingly easy to extract.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Magic <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Aspect: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>None <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★★ <tab>Employed by Eden Prime, this technique shifts the fabric of reality to trigger a powerful aetheric surge. While it inflicts considerable damage, it demands an extended casting period so as to allow mages to raise a protective barrier over themselves.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Magic <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Aspect: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>None <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★ <tab>Learned from the forgiven obscenity, this technique unleashes a beam of Light-aligned aether at opponents. Lest the responsible mage worry, being a scaled-down recreation, the spell does not possess the potency to transform living beings into sin eaters.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Magic <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Aspect: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>None <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★ <tab>Originally employed by Sephirot, the Fiend, to render foes vulnerable to attacks, this spell has been adapted for the mage's own protection. Due to the field's intrinsic instability, however, it cannot simultaneously grant both physical and magical benefits, only one or the other.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Physical <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Damage: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Piercing <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★ <tab>This imitation of the Lightwarden Innocence's technique conjures up swords of Light that rain down from the heavens. Rumor has it Lord Vauthry used the technique to turn sin eaters into meol, which may explain why it appears to bring the caster closer to his perfection.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Magic <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Aspect: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>None <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★ <tab>Inspired by Eden's Promise, this spell uses the eyes as arcane circles through which aether is channeled─a principle also seen in techniques such as Glower. So concentrated in energy is the beam, it explodes upon contact. Chirurgeon's warning: excessive use may lead to chronic dry eyes.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Magic <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Aspect: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>None <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★ <tab>Loosely based upon Aenc Thon's technique, which saw him wallop foes with a candy cane, this spell sweetens any duel with a rain of confections. The Fuath leader, for one, would not be averse to mages thus spreading the love.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Magic <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Aspect: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Fire <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★ <tab>In battle, the familiar Lugus used this technique to create a veritable conflagration. That power is now yours to wield...albeit at a greatly diminished strength. Not wishing to be responsible for burning entire cities down, the Blue Mages' Guild opted to limit the flame's intensity to a gentle sear.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Magic <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Aspect: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Water <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★★★ <tab>Part of the nixie's watery repertoire, this technique sends a swirling deluge crashing over enemies─rather too rough for its original purpose of delighting children, but it makes a fine addition to the blue mage's arsenal.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Magic <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Aspect: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>None <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★★★ <tab>While magic is ordinarily woven with words and symbols, this spell employed by the dread creation Therion harnesses the power of emotion to beget destruction. It is said that, if one can cling to the desire for oblivion, it is possible to sustain the ruinous effect indefinitely.

<var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Type: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Magic <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Aspect: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>None <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Rank: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>★★★★★ <tab>The faerie king Titania's signature move, this spell embodies the disdain, pity, and delight that men's fleeting lives inspire in the fae folk. By weaving layers upon layers of runes to create a deadly maelstrom of magic, you too can remind others of their mortality...until you inevitably meet your own demise.
